channel.title: Slayer problem
channel.description:
okej i maked my own slayer.. also i maked so it;s standing on top of my screen what i need to kill
but now comes the problem.. it's just a standard version of slayer only better(updated by myself)
it says i need to kill 10 man.. but if i attack a man now.. it's logging out :S
what is the problem or how 2 fix?
